title: Close driving distance to DFW & Love Airports, Custom Lighting
posting_body: The Georgian features lush landscaped grounds, a cascading fountain, and a sparkling swimming pool.
WiFi hot spots are at pool side and in the Clubhouse.
You will find an apartment home to suit your needs with a choice of five unique one and two bedroom floor plans, each with their own distinctive style.
Only minutes away you'll find a renowned school system, fine dining, shopping and entertainment.
Conveniently located in North Dallas just minutes from the tollway and George Bush Turnpike.
Use this link for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 609 Sq.
- Oversized Private Covered Balconies and Patios
- Close driving distance to DFW & Love Airports
- City of Dallas Gold Star Community
- Internet Hot Spots and WiFi Cafe
- Minutes to The Shops at Willowbend
- Pre-Wired for High Speed Internet and FIOS
We are located just North of PGBT on Marsh Lane on the East side of the road.
